sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
true according to a particular person or book
, tista oseba ali knjiga trdi, da je resnično.

seg.quote: According to Dr. Santos, the cause of death was drowning.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj storimo
according to a particular principle or plan
, je tisto načelo ali načrt podlaga za način, kako tisto naredimo.

seg.quote: Each person was given tasks according to their skills.
There are six classes organized according to age.
